title: Carrie Underwood wins 'American Idol' contest
title_page: Carrie Underwood wins 'American Idol' contest - The New York Times
maintext:
LOS ANGELES — Carrie Underwood, the country sweetheart who beguiled national television audiences with her strong voice and bright smile, is this yearÂ's Â'Â'American Idol,Â'Â' defeating Southern rocker Bo Bice in the showÂ's finale.
The Oklahoma native received more viewer votes than runner-up Bice, of Alabama, after TuesdayÂ's final round, snaring the title and a record contract.
A tearful Underwood choked out a brief Â'Â'thank youÂ'Â' after hearing the results Wednesday night, then spoke with a song. She reprised Â'Â'Inside Your Heaven,Â'Â' which both she and Bice performed in TuesdayÂ's final round. The judges thought Bice outsang her; the voting audience obviously disagreed.
Backstage, Underwood savored her victory and what could follow.
Â'Â'This is the best night of my life. And itÂ's going to get better,Â'Â' she said.The singer added that sheÂ's ready for the pressures of a music career and wonÂ't disappoint her fans: Country music is where she intends to make her name.
